description: A relationship element is used to define a relationship between two referable elements
title: Relationship Element
$comment: According Platform Industrie 4.0. Details of Asset Administration Shell (Version 3.0) Part 1 Release Candidate 02

links.dtdl:description: Reference to the first element in the relationship taking the role of the subject.
Direct model reference to the first element in the relationship taking the role of the subject.
links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Optional - To simplify graph by avoiding additional node and relationship

links.dtdl:description: Reference to the second element in the relationship taking the role of the subject.
Direct model reference to the second element in the relationship taking the role of the subject.
links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Optional - To simplify graph by avoiding additional node and relationship
